required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.official_title: Proof of Principle and Pharmacological Phase 0 Study With Improved Solubility Pazopanib

brief_summary.textblock: The pharmacokinetics of a new formulation with Pazopanib will be studied. This will be done in a patient cohort of n = 12.

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of participants with treatment-related adverse events as assessed by CTCAE v4.0
secondary_outcome.description: Number of participants with treatment-related adverse events as assessed by CTCAE v4.0

secondary_outcome.measure: Area under the plasma concentration versus time curve (AUC)
secondary_outcome.description: Area under the plasma concentration versus time curve (AUC)

patient_data.ipd_description: Individual participant data will remain confidential
